function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential rapid spread of COVID-19 in office workplaces due to close proximity of workers.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among workers, leading to reduced productivity, staff shortages, and potential transmission to family members and the wider community.","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures, ventilation and air filtration systems, regular testing, and hygiene protocols to reduce the risk of virus transmission.","Technologies":"Ventilation and air purification systems, remote monitoring technology for testing, contact tracing apps, and hygiene and sanitation technology.","People":"Workers, managers, and their families","Owner":"Managers, government health authorities, and facility management."},{"Description":"Inadequate infection control efforts leading to continuous exposure of workers to recirculated infected air in workplace environments.","Impact":"Rapid increase in new COVID-19 cases among workers, potential transmission to family members, and negative impact on community health.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation and air filtration systems, conducting regular air quality testing, and enforcing hygiene protocols to reduce the risk of virus transmission.","Technologies":"Ventilation and air purification systems, air quality monitoring technology, and hygiene and sanitation technology.","People":"Workers, facility management, and community members","Owner":"Managers, government health authorities, and facility management."}]}
